entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Clarenville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:16 AM NST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -3.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Terra Nova National Park 07:30 AM NST Wednesday 15 February 2023
Temperature: -3.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.6 kPa rising
Humidity: 99 %
Wind Chill: -9
Dewpoint: -4.0°C
Wind: NNW 16 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow and blowing snow. Temperature falling to minus 4 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow ending near noon then clearing. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 60 km/h gusting to 80 except gusting to 110 along exposed areas of the coast early this morning. Wind becoming northwest 60 gusting to 80 then diminishing to 40 gusting to 60 near noon. Temperature falling to minus 4 this afternoon. Wind chill near minus 12. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 10 except minus 6 along the coast.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 20 this evening. Low minus 10 except minus 6 along the coast. Wind chill minus 18 this evening. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Flurries. High zero.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the morning with flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming south 30 gusting to 50 near noon. High zero. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Wednesday 15 February 2023
